name: William ROHLAND, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS SCI-GRATERFORD (STATE OFFICE), Tom Rowland, Super/Officer at SCI-Graterford and Mike Wenerowicz, Pauline Zemorski, Mark Levy, Appellees

parties: William ROHLAND, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS SCI-GRATERFORD (STATE OFFICE), Tom Rowland, Super/Officer at SCI-Grater-ford and Mike Wenerowicz, Pauline Zemorski, Mark Levy, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
